column4: How do I clean up the "open with other application" menu, there are a lot of orphaned wine items in the list
right click,  properties,  3rd tab I think
that's just on a per file type basis.
no on a per filetype basis
kk, trying...
kk that only shows me a much smaller list of known application.  Form the right click menu, choose another application I have a long list of orphaned items
found the answer....
in /home/user/.local/share/applications had all the duplicates
there you go
also all of the .desktop files in that dir
for future reference http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=362368#8 broke it all out nicely
thanks
download and install songbird,  it'S a lot like itune
it's not working...
I beleive you need to install a plugin for the ipod , check in the menues
or do you mean that songbirg isn'T working at all ?
to be more exact, if i eject the ipod it doesn't see it again until i reboot.   I have the addon
well, I don'T know about that one,  check the songbird forum for more info , or try another application ,
checked the forums and have every ipod app installed.  :(
I meant check the songbird website for their forums and look for info on your problem
doesn'T powering the ipod off/on make it appear again 6
